description: If you like Rhum agricole, try the Broken Corazon Club, a blend of rum, fruit juices, and Fernet. Combine pineapple juice, lime juice, Fernet, and grenadine with your Rhum Agricole to make this drink. The end result is a vibrant tropical flavor mash-up.
keywords: How To Make Broken Corazon Club
name: Broken Corazon Club

recipeInstructions.name: In a shaker with ice, combine the rhum, pineapple, lime, maraschino, and grenadine.
